amendment.description: An amendment to add a new provision giving discretionary authority to officials at U.S. Ports of entry to issue one-day visa waivers to Mexican children under the age of 16 who are entering for medical, cultural or educational purposes.

action.text: Mr. Rogers (KY) raised a point of order against the Filner amendment (A019). Mr. Rogers (KY) stated that the amendment makes changes in existing law and therefore constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Filner.
